allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: RTA EW Simulator - Complete learning platform

Complete Flutter application for Electronic Warfare training:

Features:
- 3-level learning curriculum \(Basic, Intermediate, Advanced\)
- Interactive lessons with animations \(ESM, ECM, ECCM, DF\)
- Quiz system with scoring and achievements
- Tactical simulator and spectrum analyzer
- User authentication with PIN system
- Profile management with statistics tracking
- Achievement system with XP rewards

Tech Stack:
- Flutter/Dart
- SharedPreferences for local storage
- Custom animations and painters

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove git submodule and fix profile layout

- Convert embedded git repo to regular files
- Fix profile header overflow by increasing expandedHeight
- Adjust padding for better responsive layout

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
